title: Steady States and Kinetic Modelling of the Acid-Catalysed Ethanolysis of Glucose, Cellulose, and Corn Cob to Ethyl Levulinate
content:

Ethyl levulinate is a promising advanced biofuel and platform chemical that can be derived from lignocellulosic biomass by ethanolysis processes. It can be blended with both diesel and gasoline and...
